response.answer_text: With a few words Learning means: That someone is trying to aknowledge something.Trying to understand the meaning of things.Trying to understand how to do things.Acquiring knowledge or skill with study, experience or being taught.Examples George is learning how to use a shovel with this guide book.These kids are learning the alphabet by writting it down and studying it.Peter gave me this book with which I’ll be learning what a dog is.Hope that helped!
It means that there is much more to be learnt.
